overview: A group discussion about porn film intros; they can be intriguing, awkward or kind of hot, but often the style is quite recognizable and the way of acting can be delightfully silly. This style is then cultivated in acted-out sequences, where an osteopath is very dedicated to making her client relax and the much waited-for plumber finally arrivesâ€¦
title: You Called for a Plumber?
